properties.name: dolly.nais.cluster
properties.description: The cluster where the application is running.. Defaults to dev-gcp if not set.

properties.name: dolly.nais.name
properties.description: Application name, as defined in the NAIS manifest (which is not necessarily the same as in Spring config).

properties.name: dolly.nais.secrets
properties.description: List of secrets to also include when looking up environment variables from the NAIS environment. The contents of the secret(s) are included as key-value pairs.

properties.name: dolly.nais.variables
properties.description: List of environment variables to be read from the NAIS environment, and set as system properties when running in local profile. If dolly.nais.secrets is also set, the variables will also be looked for in the referenced secrets.
